title: Diamond Floral Chain - Contemporary Haaram
features: Delicate 22k gold chain featuring a series of intricately set diamond floral motifs. The floral clusters are evenly spaced along the chain, providing a subtle yet sparkling adornment. Modern design with a touch of traditional flair, suitable for everyday wear or special occasions.
occasions: or a special gift for loved ones. Also perfect for contemporary celebrations and events where a touch of elegance is desired.
description: This diamond floral chain is a timeless piece blending modern design with the enduring value of 22K gold and brilliant-cut diamonds. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine. Its versatile design makes it perfect for any occasion, offering both everyday wearability and elegant sophistication.
